titleStmt.title: The life & death of Hannibal, the great captain of the Carthaginians who maintained wars against all the power of Rome for eighteen years together in Italy : as also The life and death of Epaminondas, the great captain of the Thebans ... / by Sa. Clarke ...
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.

notesStmt.note: The first part has special t.p.
